name: ticker-cache-mcp
description: MCP server for stock ticker data cache with Yahoo Finance integration
long_description: A comprehensive MCP server that provides cached access to stock ticker data from Yahoo Finance. Supports ticker lookup, company name search, market index retrieval (S&P 500, NASDAQ-100, Dow Jones), and metrics calculation (annualized return and volatility). Features a unified lookup API that auto-detects input type (ticker, comma-list, index name, or company name) and caches all results for performance.

tools.name: lookup
tools.description: Unified ticker lookup supporting single ticker, comma-separated list, index name (sp500, nasdaq100, dow), or company name search. Auto-detects input type and caches all results.

tools.name: refresh_metrics
tools.description: Fetch 1-year historical prices and calculate annualized return and volatility for tickers or indexes.
